group_1.textRight: Woah...
So the lords of Soma have been@ruling this land for a long time.

group_1.textLeft: Although there have been some changes in station,@such as the provincial and military governors,
the samurai have been deeply entwined@with this country for ages,
such as with the Mizuna Clan@or Suitoku Temple.
However, after Lord Sumiya took post as@the military governor, he was…cut down.

group_1.textRight: ...You mean he was murdered?

group_1.textLeft: I can't say it didn't happen, but this conflict@mostly stems from the joining of the clans.

group_1.narration: ―Tsuyu―@Among our clans, the Kumai Clan is our leader@and the chief military governor.
―Tsuyu―@They serve as the lords of Mizuna Castle in the Sumiya Clan's@stead, the latter of whom are based in Kyoto.
―Tsuyu―@The other clans― the Sango, Nagitsu, and Sakae―@have been married into the Sumiya as well.
―Tsuruno―@So are you gonna marry into the Sumiya Clan too?
―Tsuyu―@I have no intention of devoting myself to the Sumiya,@who stole away our clan's territory.
―Tsuyu―@...But after my father's refusal to have me wed,@our clan has been all but exiled,
―Tsuyu―@hence why we've been sent to a place@as remote as Hokuyo…

group_1.textLeft: How complicated...

group_1.textRight: None of this was in Iroha's record.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry...but I'm having trouble@wrapping my head around all this.
Hmm... How do I put it…
It's like if a delinquent were@to transfer into your class,
and all of your classmates started@submitting to the new student.
It sounds like the people of Mizuna and@Suitoku are still holding out, though...

group_1.textRight: So everyone used to be good friends,@but then they split themselves apart...
...Tsuruno.
While you're on the subject,@may you inquire about Daito?

group_1.textLeft: Sure thing!
It's the age of the Battle Shamanesses of@the East and West, so it's worth asking.

group_1.textRight: Say, is there a place called Daito@here in Soma?

group_1.textLeft: Do not use that name so lightly,@Lady Tsuruno!

group_1.textRight: Yipes! S-sorry, I didn't realize...

group_1.textLeft: No, of course you wouldn't be aware.@Allow me to explain...
They refer to themselves with the "Tai" of "peace",@and the "To" of "party": the Taito Gang.
They are bandits who obey no ruler, setting up@fraudulent checkpoints to commit robbery.
Not only that, they break into temples and@pavillions and plunder their money and valuables.
They give to the poor, but that's just them@keeping up appearances.
In truth, they are monsters@who manipulate Demons.

group_1.textRight: Demons...?

group_1.textLeft: The entities we battle after contracting@to become Battle Shamanesses.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see.

group_1.textLeft: The Taito Gang have been using these@Demons to bring about the famine.

group_1.textRight: So those farmers who were trying to@attack the sacred tree yesterday...

group_1.textLeft: If I'm not mistaken, the Taito Gang@instigated that rebellion.
They are peculiar foes.
We have been at odds for@nigh on centuries.
Governor Sumiya had his concerns as well, but@nobody knows the whereabouts of the Taito Gang.
We can't even locate their leader@Saemon Banshu.

group_1.textRight: It's quite the headache...
Ah, we're approaching the manse.

group_1.textLeft: Lady Tsuruno.

group_1.textRight: Yes?

group_1.textLeft: Although Lord Masatsuna and I are old@acquaintances, he will be wary of you.
You should devise some way@to gain his trust.

group_1.textRight: You could've warned me in advance...
It's okay, Tsuruno...! Leave it to me!

group_1.textCenter: And now sounds are coming@from all around us...
And all the hanging scrolls are falling...!
Whew... What do you think of@my almighty powers?!

group_1.textLeft: ...What do you make of this, Gen'un?

group_1.textRight: Such feats are evidence of@a Battle Shamaness's power.
It would be beneficial to have her aiding the@princess as she does battle with the Demons.
And as the princess herself said, this woman@defended Mizuna's sacred tree.
I myself would not have made this journey@if I had no reason to endorse her.

group_1.textLeft: ...I see.
Then Tsuruno Yui shall stand by@Tsuyu's side as her guardian.

group_1.textRight: Thank you very much!
That was a clever use@of your invisibility, Sana.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.
I tried working with@my unique strengths...!
Alright, without further ado!
I look forward to working with you,@Tsuruno.

group_1.textRight: Same here, Princess Tsuyu!
